```{ojs}
data = FileAttachment("Carefirst-PPO_negotiated_price_range.csv").csv({ typed: true })
data
```

```{ojs}
viewof maxprice = Inputs.range(
  [0, 100000], 
  {value: 5000, step: 100, label: "Max negotiated price:"}
)
```

```{ojs}
filtered = data.filter(function(procedure) {
  return procedure.max_negotiated_price < maxprice
})
```

```{ojs}
Plot.plot({
  inset: 0,
  grid: true,
  color: {
    legend: true,
  },
  marks: [
    Plot.dot(filtered, {x: "min_negotiated_price", y: "max_negotiated_price"}),
    Plot.dot(filtered, {x: "min_negotiated_price", y: "max_negotiated_price", text:"name"})    
  ]
})
```
